author: Lee Hutchinson
title: Ars Pro week, day 2: If you subscribe we’ll pour more ketchup on Lee Hutchinson
description: We'll turn your subscription dollars into opportunities to humiliate one senior editor.
content:
0 with 0 posters participating
Coronavirus. Climate change. Worldwide unrest. Mass extinctions. Killer robots. There's a lot of stuff to worry about, and more things get added to the list daily. (Seriously, the robotswhy do the scientists keep making them?!)… [+4767 chars]
